author: "Hoffmann, Friedrich, 1660-1742"
title: "Friderici Hoffmanni med. doct. Clavis pharmaceutica Schroederiana, seu Animadversiones cum annotationibus in pharmacopoejam Schroederianam Baconianis, Cartesianis, & Helmontianis principiis illustratae & dn. D. Hohannis Michaelis p. m. & aliorum celeberri"
